title: Question:
author: bisdak40
created_time: December 25, 2022, 02:54:56 AMLast edit: January 15, 2023, 08:09:14 AM by bisdak40
content: cttoDate: TBDVenue: TBDQuote“His next fight will be with Lomachenko. We are working out the date and the site right now. But that’s his next fight. Devin win or lose is going to be a big, big factor in the sport of boxing. A terrific young man. A very very good fighter. I like the way he carries himself. I like the way he fights. And with lomachenko he’s in with the master. So that will be a very interesting fight.”- Top Rank CEO Bob ArumIf we were to believe this words of Bob Arum, this fight will be the biggest fight in the lower division next and i personally believed that this would happen as Haney needed this fight with Loma to get the respect of the hard core fans but also a risky one for him as he has everything to lose to the master technician Lomachenco.Who do you think has the advantage on this matchup?

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: The bad thing in this fight is still not officially confirmed yet In the other boxing matches, I usually consider about the reach advantage about the boxers, but Lomachenko is an exception. There's huge reach difference between Lomachenko and Haney, Lomachenko reach is 166 cm while Haney reach is 180 cm. But Lomachenko have fought many boxers that has 180 cm reach e.g. Commey, Nakatani, and Campbell, Lomachenko doesn't have any problem with it.With a high technical, a lot stamina and quick movement by Lomachenko, he would win against Haney.

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: Let us assume the fight is about to happen, I think Devin Haney has the advantage here.  I saw it when the two talked in the post-fight interview and see how huge Devin Haney is.  Even Lomachenco joke around if Haney is a lightweight.  If Loma shows the same move in his last fight, I think there is no chance he can win against Devin Haney because his performance is quite disappointing compared to his best performance.  So I think Devin Haney will be the one with the advantage here and Loma might be the underdog.

So I'm not going to be surprised that Devin Haney will be the favorite in this fight.However, we should wait for the official date though.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on December 25, 2022, 04:41:09 AMThe bad thing in this fight is still not officially confirmed yet How I wished they confirmed it, it's going to be a battle of two technical fighters who rely on the beauty and science of boxing, it's hard for me to analyze who has the advantage in this matchup, both fighters can beat just anybody on their best night I'm sure for the legacy they want to face each other, unlike Ryan Garcia, both fighters, are not cherry picking their fights so if Bob Arum deals with both camps they will definitely take this fight, this is to give their fans and the boxing community a match they deserve.

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: I wouldn't count Loma here, he could just have a bad performance against Ortiz the last time, could be ring rust only.So in any case, this is going to be a good technical match as put are very defensive fighters and very skilled. Maybe Haney could be just a slight advantage when the odds are listed, but for sure we all wanted Loma to be the underdog because our bet will get a good win. Too early for now, but this fight for sure can be made without any hitch as both are under Bob Arum's Top Rank promotions.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: I think this is already made verbally, as long as Haney won against Kambosos and then Loma against the young Ortiz.So by principle this is already set up by Top Rank, both fighters are under their umbrella so it make sense that Arum will have to make this fight, fans wanted it, and all in house money for him. Probably we will just have to wait for the official venue and date but I will say that 99% this fight is made already.And yes, this is going to be a great match games, style makes fight as we say, so it will be another test for Loma's ability to overcome a very technical boxer such as Devin Haney.

comments.author: Japinat
comments.body: Based on the betting odds, Devin Haney has the advantage in this game. However, we know how good Vasiliy Lomachenco is, he is very unpredictable, so although he is not the favorite, I still believe that this is a 50/50 match. @bisdak40, you can put a poll to answer your question.

comments.author: Russlenat
comments.body: There's no official announcement yet but the good news is that both camps are ready to make this fight happen. Let's keep this thread as the official thread until that big fight will happen. In terms of advantage, it's hard to guess because they are both great boxers, maybe Haney has the advantage but only a slight advantage, not a big deal though.

comments.author: Distinctin
comments.body: I guess we will have a 50/50 votes here on both sides. This is a fight where there's no clear favorite, but judging on their respective record, you can tell that Haney has the better one, which makes him the favorite on this fight. Let's update this thread on the development since it's not yet official but it's very close to happening since they had approve it already verbally.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: These two will not back out if the negotiation push through, and both fighters are not afraid to carve their legacy they don't have such thing as a tune fight or a cherry-picked, its hard to guess or predict between two technically gifted fighters will go down on who has a better fight plan and implement the fight plan well, an injured free Loma always comes out the better fighter his fight against Lopez is a fluke because he has a broken arm, and Haney is always dangerous he is a master of his craft, its going to be a hard pick for the betting public if this fight happen.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: Now, this is a good match. I'd like Lomachenko to win. I'm a big fan of him, but I think Devin Haney has the right tools to really challenge the boxing maestro. Loma will probably have a hard time getting inside Haney with the latter's significant reach advantage, but he has to. That's his only way to score. He needs to come closer to land those punches. Haney, however, is not only good in maintaining that distance, he is also a good counter puncher. Any attempt for Loma to come in, there will definitely be a punch waiting. But I think Loma still has that speed and footwork. He can probably handle Haney well. I'm really looking forward to this match, and cheer for Loma.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: bisdak40 on December 25, 2022, 02:54:56 AMWho do you think has the advantage on this matchup?I think it's important that the boxing schedule between Devin and Vasyl Lomachenko is important and needs to be announced soon, the official betting schedule, I saw on TV the sports section, as Devin's father comments on the announcement for his son to fight Lomachenko in the ring in the future, announced soon he said.Elsewhere, the boxing promoter also conveyed several things about the cons, the most important part of which had been agreed upon by both parties, both of them agreed and were interested in a duel between Devin vs. Vasyl Lomachenko, i think it's a good point to ease the negotiation between Devin vs. Vasyl and could quickly announce the boxing schedule between the two of them.For me fist between Devin vs. Vasyl is a great duel once the schedule is set, it's a great fight to watch and place bets on.

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: ^^ Shakur will have his time, yes he is in his prime but this is a different weight class for him. Let the old dogs like Loma achieved what he has looking for in this division, get all the belts. And I think this is more interesting than a Shakur fight because Stevenson is somewhat a defensive fighter as well. So it will be somewhat boring to see both Haney and Shakur I reckon.I will still give Loma a chance to win, yes, Haney might be in his prime and tall and long, but we have seen Loma fight this kind of fighters before and won thru his skills. So I will go with Loma probably in a decision.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Whoever wins the match has a claim for being the best in the Lightweight, these two boxers can be considered a hall of Famer candidates and they are both achievers, for me, Haney has a slight advantage because he is the younger one and has advantages in height and he is used to Loma's style of the fighting because Loma has a similarity with Kambosos style of fighting but Loma still has it if we judge his condition to his two previous fight.
